name: BG BLU
description:
BG BLU my #LD36 jam entry. It's an exploration game. I don't want to spoiler much ;), have fun!

Controls:
Mouse to look around
WASD to walk
Shift to run
Space to jump
R to restart

Credits:
Art, Programming, Game Design, Sound Design, Story:
- Djamel Berkaoui
